If a foreign body sensation remains in your eyes, please consult an ophthalmologist. ○ Please use with care to ensure there are no abnormalities on your skin. If the cosmetics do not suit your skin, please discontinue use immediately in the following cases. Continuing to use cosmetics may worsen symptoms, so it is recommended to consult a dermatologist or specialist. (1) During use, if abnormalities such as redness, swelling, itching, irritation, color loss (white spots, etc.), or darkening appear. (2) If the skin used is exposed to direct sunlight and the above abnormalities appear. ○ Do not use on areas with wounds, swelling, eczema, or other abnormalities.
